title: John K Samson from The Weakerthans
itunes:title: John K Samson from The Weakerthans
description:
Episode 335 - White Whale guest alert! I have the John K. Samson from The Weakerthans on the show today. I can’t even believe I am typing this but we spoke on the phone and my life is complete. We discuss community building, songwriting and mental health. I love him and his band so so much so this was a dream come true. Enjoy the discussion! Visit Wiretap Records and use the code 100WORDS for $15 dollars off your order! Visit Rockabilia and use the code PCJABBERJAW for 10% off your order! 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
